Package architecture

Class Trust

  • java.lang.Object
    • architecture.Trust

  • public class Trust
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects that describe a trust relation between two components. Either a blind trust, or just the trust that a defined set of variables can be shared.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Short Constructor for blind trust

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trust

        public Trust​(Component i,
             Component j,
             java.util.Set<Variable> vars)
        Constructor for trust. This creates a blind trust, if the variable list is empty.
        Parameters:
        i - the trusting component
        j - the trusting component
        vars - the list of variables that j is trusted with

      • isEqual

        public boolean isEqual​(Component comp1,
                       Component comp2,
                       java.util.Set<Variable> varSet)
        Method that checks if this trust relation involves the two provided components.
        Parameters:
        comp1 - the first component
        comp2 - the second component
        varSet - the (potentially empty) set of variables
        Returns:
        true, if the four components are pairwise equal
